#include <iostream>
using namespace std ;
long long gcd(long long a,long long b) 
{
	if (b==0)
	return a;
	return gcd(b,a%b) ;
}
int main () 
{
	int t;
	long int m, n, sum, i, j;
	cin>>t;
	while (t--) 
	{
		cin>>m>>n;
		if (m==1||n==1) sum=m>=n?m:n;
		else if (m==n) sum=m;
		else sum=1+(m>=n?gcd(m-1,n-1):gcd(n-1,m-1)) ;
		cout <<sum<<endl ;
	}
}
